result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven J Morgan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $25.00 per month.  1 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.

records.addlTxt: I do not plan to seek postconviction relief.

Defendant Steven J Morgan in court with attorney Carolyn Delery for Erin Joy Larsen.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Maggie Techert.  State rec:  plea to cts 1 & 2 - 100+cc on both.  Ct 3 - DRI.  Atty E Larsen now present.
COP filed.
P - G
BTC:  Guilty cts 1 & 2
Ct 3 - DRI.
50+cc on ea
PPP $25/mo begin 11-1-15
FTP:  1 day
DNA ordered
Status conference on August 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  Do not drive unless properly licensed.   You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Office Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 4:00 p.m. Defendant has three weeks from today to have this done. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance. DEFENDANT MAY TAKE PRESCRIPTIONS PRESCRIBED BY A PHYSICIAN.   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Steven J Morgan in court with attorney Sheila M. Smith.  Gerad T Dougvillo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 18, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Steven J Morgan in court.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  
BTC: Adjourn for defendant to hire an atty   Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 18, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
